name: dvops-part1
description: This is a repository for the DVOPS Project

scripts.frontend-instrument: nyc instrument "./public/js" "./public/instrumented/js" && xcopy "./public/*.html" "./public/instrumented/" /Y /I && xcopy "./public/images" "./public/instrumented/images/" /E /Y /I && xcopy "./public/css" "./public/instrumented/css/" /E /Y /I && if exist "./coverage-frontend/*.json" del /Q "./coverage-frontend/*.json"
scripts.frontend-report: nyc report --reporter html --reporter text -t coverage-frontend --report-dir coverage-frontend/summary
